GK16ruyalscu:366: yathā ca - saṃsārārtyā vidhuravidhuro brahma yatnādvicinvan nānārūpaṃ jagadidamahaṃ dṛṣṭavāneva pūrvam /

GK16ruyalscu:370: yastiṣṭhetpratihāra sīmni bhavato ruddhapraveśaściraṃ kiṃ nāsāvapi colapāṇḍyapṛthvīpālaiḥsamaṃ gaṇyate //
GK16ruyalscu:379: bhāvābhāso yathā - kvaṇādūdvirephāvalinīlaṅkaṇāṃ prasāryaṃ śākhābhujamāmra vallarī /
GK16ruyalscu:387: bhāvasandhiryathā - netre jihyakharāruṇe kṣaṇāmatha vyāmīlyamānekṣaṇāṃ hastaṃ vyagragamāganaṃ kṣaṇāmatho dante śayānaṃ kṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:388: sañcāraṃ viṣamākulaṃ kṣaṇamatha prakrāntalīlaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dhatte totriṣu ṣaṭpadeṣu ca samaṃ dattāvadhāno gajaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:389: atra gajasya madākulasya yadetatkṣaṇamātraṃ netrayoḥ jihyākharā ruṇāyoḥ dharaṇāṃ samanantarameva yaccaitadūvyāmīlanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:390: tathā haste ca yatkṣaṇāmatraṃ vyagro gamāgamaḥ yacca samanantarameva dante śayanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:393_0: tadetat vividhaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viceṣṭitadvayaṃ udbhavābhibhavadharmitayā kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇāmāvirbhavat
GK16ruyalscu:393_1: totriviṣayaṃ roṣaṃ ṣaṭpadaśabdalakṣitaṣaṭpadagītaviṣayaṃ harṣa ca parasparasyādattā
GK16ruyalscu:394_0: dvandva vṛttiṣu ca triṣvapi vākyeṣu pratisvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamityupādānādyathā yathā
GK16ruyalscu:395: dhatta iti vartamānanirdeśena prārabdhāparisamātpabhāvādekatarasyāṃ koṭāvaniṣṭheti dyotyate /
GK16ruyalscu:397: totriṣuṣaṭpadeṣu ca tulitamavadhānadānaṃ tadapyeka tarasyāṃ koṭā vaniṣṭāmeva vyanakti /
GK16ruyalscu:399: bhāvaśabalatā yathā - madhyesakhījanamupahvaravṛttajātaṃ vācā prakāśayati mayyupadeśavṛttyā /
GK16ruyalscu:400: sāsūyasapraṇāyasatrapa saprasādaiḥ sā māṃ vilokitavatī caṭulaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:403: bhāvaśāntiryathā tau saṃmukhapracalitau savidhe guruṇāṃ mārgapradānarabhasaskhalitāvadhānau /
GK16ruyalscu:408: atha saṃlakṣyakrame śabdaśaktimūlo 'laṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśca niyamena bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:409: tatrālaṅkārarūpo yathā - prāpyādharadvayadhurāṃ paricumbatīva līlottaraṃ vilikhatīva nakhatvametya /
GK16ruyalscu:410: tasyāḥ kaṭākṣavalanaṃ gurusannidhau māmāśrliṣyatīva samavāpya ca bāhubhāvam //
GK16ruyalscu:411: atrotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa cumbanādikāraṇā bhāve 'pi saṃbhogasukhā vātpilakṣaṇākāryotpattirūpā vibhāvanā vyajyate /
GK16ruyalscu:414: saṃsparśaṃ ca na tasya vetyupacitastambhaṃ mamaitadvapuḥ saṃvṛttaḥsakhi saṅgamo 'pi virahaprāyo vidhātāsmi kim //
GK16ruyalscu:415: atra vastuni avastutvabhramāt maugdhyalakṣaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:417: sa cālaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti pratyekaṃ dvaividhye ṣoḍhā /
GK16ruyalscu:419: tathā hi - svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā alaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:423: tenālaṅkāraḥ kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena alaṅkāreṇa vastu tena alaṅkāraḥ ityapi caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:425: atra prapañcaḥ saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭokāyāṃ asmābhiḥ vitatyopa darśita iti tato 'vadhāryaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:426: iha tu granthagauravabhayāt prastāvānupayogācca na pratanyate /
GK16ruyalscu:427: diṅmātrantūdāhliyate- tatra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu yathā - adyāpi loke na kavirna so 'sti prācāṃ tulāṃ yaḥ prabalo 'dhiroḍhum /
GK16ruyalscu:428: purātano nāyamitīya deva tathāpi nindā yadi kiṃ karotu //
GK16ruyalscu:429: atra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā aham evaṃvidha iti vaktuḥ svamāhātmyaprakhyāpanalakṣaghaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate //
GK16ruyalscu:430: kavinibaddhenālaṅkāreṇa vastu yathā - dṛṣṭirniṣṭhura baddhasārakhadirāṅgāra sphuliṅgopamā jihve sajjanatarjanolbaṇābalatkālāṅgulīcañcale /
GK16ruyalscu:432: kūrānukāraḥsakhe jaṅghe dve yadi tebhujaṅgabhuvanaṃ valmīkaśeṣaṃ bhavet //
GK16ruyalscu:433: atra kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena aprastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāreṇa vidhivihitamanāryāṇāṃ kvicidaṃśe daurbalyaṃ viśvamabhirakṣatīti vastu /
GK16ruyalscu:439: kavinibaddhāyāḥ svairiṇyāḥ prauḍhoktiniṣpāditena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa upagūhanādinivāraṇāśālibhyo 'sya bāndhavamaraṇamahotsavasya atiśayapratyāyanātmā vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:444: sandigdhaprādhānyaṃ tulyaprādhānyaṃ kākkākṣitpa masundaratvam iti vācyāṅgatvādayo bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:447: tatra vācyāṅgatvaṃ yathā - śūnye tvadripurājadhāmni sudṛśāṃ citrārpitā nāṃ karaṃ saṃllāpaspṛhayā patannapi muhuḥ kīraḥsamārohati /
GK16ruyalscu:450: atra śūnyīkṛtaripurājaveśmā nāyakaprabhāvātiśayaḥ pratīyamāno 'pi śukahaṃsavṛttāntopapādakatvena sthita iti vācyāṅgatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:452: itthaṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyayoḥsvarūpamupodgadhātatvena yathāyogamupanyasya prakaraṇā pratipipādayiṣitaṃ citrākhyaṃ kāvyamadhikīrṣurāha-citraṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:455: ihārthapaunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyaṃ śabdārthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti trayaḥ paunaruktyaprakārāḥ // RuAss_1 //
GK16ruyalscu:456: nanu citramityupakramya paunaruktyaprakārakathane kā saṅgatiḥ ityata āha ādau paunakuktyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:457_1: kakṣyāvibhāgaṃ ghaṭayituṃ kakṣyāvibhāgasyaiva ca sphuṭīkārāya pratyekaṃ paunaruktyagrahaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:461: nanu śabdapratītipūrvakatvādarthapratīteḥ prathamaṃ arthapaunaruktyanirdeśo na yujyata ityata āha-arthāpekṣayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:466: nirdiṣṭasya ca paunaruktyatrayasya sampabratipannatāmabhisandhāyāha-śābde prasthāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:468: nanu traya evetisamāptyarthatā kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-triśabdādevetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:474: na ca mantavyaṃ sati prakāraśabde paunaruktyaṃ prasajediti /
GK16ruyalscu:475: prakāraśabdo hi paunaruktyaprakāramābaha-sa ca paunaruktyaprakāraḥ kena prakāreṇa triprakāra iti jijñāsāyām itiśabdaḥ tatprakāra vacana iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:483: upādeye pratiyegyantare prasṛtāyāḥ pratipattṝ pratīteḥ avyākṣepāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:486: bhāvānayane dravyānayanamiha anusartavyaṃ nirdhārite paunaruktyatraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:489: yacchravaṇasamanantaraṃ yathāvadavabhātaṃ tattathaiva cetpratītiḥviśrāntyantaṃ nirbādham avatiṣṭheta sa praroha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:494: nanu lakṣyapade punaruktavadābhāsa iti svarūpaprādhānyena nirdeśo nyāyyaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:495: na tu punaruktavadābhāsamiti kāvyaparatantratayā ityata āha-lakṣyanirdeśa ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:504: paryavasāneṣu ahīnasya mahato bhujaṅgādhīśasya vapurvalayaṃ kaṅkaṇamasyetyanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:505: itthaṃ śilāderapatyaṃ śailādiḥ śailādeḥ nandina iva caritamasyeti,
GK16ruyalscu:511: tathā śikhī pāvakaśca locane yasyeti ca śikhipāvakalocana iti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:512: tathā sarvamaṅgalāsahitaḥ pārvatīśa iti ca sarvairmaṅgalaismahitaśteti paunaruktyaṃ cāmukhābhāsanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:514: atha vyastatayā samāsāntarāyaśrayatayā ca darśiyitumudāharaṇāntaraṃ-dāruṇa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:517: itthaṃ bhasma ca bhūtiśceti bhasmavano 'bhivṛddiriti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:518: tathā raktaṃ ca śoṇāṃ ceti ca rudhiravacchreṇamiti cāvagantavyamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:521: kuṇḍalī sarpo bhujaṅgaśca kuṇḍalī ceti bhujaṅgakuṇḍalavāniti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:524: śaṃ śivaḥ śubhraiḥ aṃśubhiḥ śītaṃ cakṣurindriyamiti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:525: haraḥśiva iti ceto hara iti ca yojanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:527: pāyādavyācceti tu tiṅantāpekṣayā ita ityapāyaviśeṣaṇatvena paryavasāne pañcamyantatayā pāyādavyādityanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:532: atrādyaṃ padamuddeśyaṃ caramaṃ tu dvayaṃ vidheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:535: nanu kevalasvarapaunaruktyasya kiṃ vṛttamityata āha-alaṅkāraprastāva ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:537: tatprastāve kevalasvarapaunaruktyama cārutvāt na gaṇanāmarhatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:547: nanu sāyaṃ kāyamityatra ko 'laṅkāra ityata āha-atra sāyaṃ śabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:550: itthaṃ ca sati sāyaṃ śabde dvayorekābhidhānalakṣaṇāḥsaṅkaraḥ abhidhatta ityabhidhānaṃ vācaka śabdaḥ ekavācakānupraveśalakṣaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:560: śṛṅgārādirasaviṣayo yo 'yaṃ pratiniyamabhājāṃ varṇānāṃ vyañjanavyāpāraḥ sa vṛttirucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:561: so 'yaṃ varṇavyāpāro 'smin varṇāracanātmake kavivyāpāre 'stītyupacāreṇa varṇaracanāvṛttirityāha-tadvatī punarityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:569: yāvatā śabdālaṅkāreṣvapi yo bahiraṅgo vṛttyanuprāsātmā varṇālaṅkāraḥ taddharmatvāt tacchreṣabhūtā etā ityalamaprāsaṅgikavaidaddhya pravacanena /
GK16ruyalscu:575: sitāsitaruceḥ uttaralatārakatvāt anavasthitavarṇasanniveśāḥ sācīkṛtāḥ apāṅgānnirgantum ivehamānāḥsālasā rasānuśayaṃ nivartamānāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:577: sākūtā bhavatu paśyāma itīva vyāharantyaḥ sarasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:578: raso rāge viṣe vīrye tiktādau pārade drave /
GK16ruyalscu:579: roṣāruṇimnā viṣayaṃ viṃliṃpantyaḥ mānānuvidvāḥ dṛṣṭaśrutādyaparādhajanmā roṣomānastena saṃmūrcchitāḥ jvalatkalpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:583: yadyapi kavervāṇī prabalena śabdāḍambareṇa khelantī prārambhe prathate,
GK16ruyalscu:584_0: tathāpi satāṃ mānorañjanaṃ na kurute amandaiḥ sundaraiśca guṇālaṅkāraiḥ mukharīkṛtaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:584_1: saniṣpandaṃ vilasadrasāyana rasā sārānusārī śṛṅgārādiko raso yāvanna syādityatra
GK16ruyalscu:585: bhphaṅkāritetyādāvekadhā samudāyasādṛśyaṃ rasāyana rasetyatra tu raseti samudāyatrayasya parasparasādṛśyamityanusandheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:586: tathā ca “āṭope” tyādau gauḍīyā “amandasundare” tyādau vaidarbhī,
GK16ruyalscu:589: so 'nuprāsaḥsa ca cheka vṛttyu pādhiva śādrūdvidhā //
GK16ruyalscu:600: svaravyañjanātmakasya śabdasamudāyasya yattenaiva rūpeṇa punarvacanaṃ tadyamanādyamakam /
GK16ruyalscu:603: kintu sarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ bhedānāmetadvaicitryatrayam āvahatīti abhiprāyeṇāha-atra kacidbhinnārthetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:608: rucire ramye vanajāyate padmadalavat dīrghe tasyāḥ netre yo yaḥ paśyayati,
GK16ruyalscu:610: idaṃ dvayoḥsārthakatve anarthakatve dvairūpye yathā- tvaṃ rāvaṇa/
GK16ruyalscu:615: itthamarthapaunaruktye punaruktavadābhāsaṃ śabdapaunaruktye tu anuprāsayamakālaṅkārau ca vivecitau /
GK16ruyalscu:622: śabdasyārthasya ca punarvacanamanuvādādatirikte viṣaye doṣaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:630: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayairgṛhyante /
GK16ruyalscu:632: atra dvitīyayorguṇa kamalaśabdayoḥ ślāghādyā śrayatvaṃ tātparyabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:642: itthaṃ ca sati padanubandhanatayā prātipadika mātranibandhanatayā ca lāṭānuprāso dvidhā mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:654: yatra tāveva śabdārthau tātparyaṃ tu vibhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:661: tathopamādayo 'pi sādharmyādivyapāśrayeṇa vargaśo 'vasthāyina ityava bodhitaṃ mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:667_1: paunaruktyaṃ tadātmakasya khaṅgabandhādicitrasya kathanaṃ paunaruktyaprastāve saṅgacchrata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:670: khaṅgādisanniveśo hi lipyakṣarāṇām eva na śrotrākāśa samavāyināmṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:671: vācakatvaṃ tu śrotrākāśasamavāyināmeva na punarlipi sanniveśinām /
GK16ruyalscu:672: itthaṃ ca sati khaṅgādibandhagatānāṃ yadyapi vācakaśabdālaṅkāratā nopapadyate,
GK16ruyalscu:674: ataḥ sthūlabuddhilālanīyatvāt vācakaśabdabahirbhāvācca nātra kavibhirādaraḥ kārya iti mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:678: ato yathāvyutpatti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ ca padmamuraja gomūtrikādibandhānāṃ parigraho 'bhyanujñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:690: dalāni dikṣu catvāri catvāri ca vigikṣu,
GK16ruyalscu:692: atha daleṣu dvayaṃ dvayamakṣarāṇāṃ prāgdalāt prādakṣiṇyena pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:694: atrāyaṃ niṣkarṣaḥ- karṇikāyāṃ likhedekaṃ dvau dikṣu vivikṣu ca /
GK16ruyalscu:703: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nayatītyupamānam aprākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamena adhikaguṇameva bhavati guṇādhāvṛtvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:704: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nīyate ityupameyaṃ prākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamenādheyaguṇatvāt nyūnaguṇāmevaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:713: ato merusarṣapādau vivakṣayā parikalpayituṃ śakyo 'pi upamānopameyabhāvo nālaṅkāraviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:715: bhedābhedetyasya vyāvartya darśayituṃ sādharmyaṃ prakārānvivinakti sādharmye yatra ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:721: bhegābhedatulyatva evopamā syāditi yaduktaṃ tatprāmāṇikasaṃvādena draḍhayitumāha-yadāhurityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:727: yadetadasyā uddeśe prāthamyaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ darśayati-upamaiva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:737: candra eva na mukham iti apahnutaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:740: asyāṃ prāvṛṣi mukhaṃ candrabimbañca vicchrāyamityekā tulyayogitā /
GK16ruyalscu:743: mukhameva ramyaṃ candra eva hṛdya iti prativastūpamā /
GK16ruyalscu:749: na mukhena vinā candraḥ samīcīnā itivinīktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:753: mukhe roṣo na doṣāya nahīndo rnindāyai kalaṅkarekhetyarthāntanyāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:763: ayaṃ punarācāryaḥ sarvasyaivopamāprapañcasya anyaiḥ anupapāditacara vaicitryatrayamupapādayiṣurāha-tatrāpi sādhāraṇādharmasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:765: mukhaṃ candra iva hṛdyamityekenaiva rūpeṇa hṛdya tvādeḥsādhāraṇadharmasya nirdeśaḥ kriyate ityekaṃ vaicitryam /
GK16ruyalscu:767: ekor'tho vastutvenopameyagataḥ prativastutvena nirdiśyata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:771: “valitakandharamānanamāvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibham” ityādau hi yena saha saṃbadhnāti sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ sa sambandhī,
GK16ruyalscu:772: kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ ekatra kandharā aparatra vṛntaṃ tadbhedopādhinā svayamabhinno 'pi abhedodharmobhedena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:776: abhinna dharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:778: abhinnadharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:779: yadā punaraṃsārpita hāro 'yaṃ sanirjharodgāra ivetyādau sādharmyaṃ dharmidvārakaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:786: yā yāvatī saṃbhavatyupamāpūrṇā lutpā ca saprabhedaprapañcā sā sarvaivāsmadupadarśitena vaicitryatrayeṇa tridhā prathata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:788: prabhāpekṣayā mahatīti kathanāt svāpekṣayā tanvīti vivakṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:790: ubhe hi khalu ete svāpekṣayā tanīyasyau prabhāpekṣayā tu mahatyau /
GK16ruyalscu:797: itthaṃ ca satyanupāttasyāpi sādhāraṇadharmasyānu gāmitayaikarūpyeṇa nirdeśa udāhṛto mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:798: yadvā trimārgayetyetadeva tantreṇa nyāyena devīviśeṣaṇatayāpi saṅgacchrate /
GK16ruyalscu:808: yāntyā upavanātpuraṃ prati kareṇukayā gacchantyāsahacarīsaṃllāpādivyapadeśena vāraṃvāramapavṛttaśirodharā,
GK16ruyalscu:809: ata eva āvṛttavṛntasya kalahaṃsakarṇakaṇḍūyanādinā vivalitabandhanasya kuśeśayasya sadṛśyam ānanam vahantyāḥ kaṭākṣo me hṛdaye nikhātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:819: atraika eva dharmaḥsambandhibhedena valitāvṛttaśabdābhyāṃ vastuprativastubhāvena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:828: nanu upameyatvamupamānatvaṃ ca kathamekatraiva saṅgacchta ityāha-vācyābhiprāyeṇotyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:829: pūrvaṃ rūpamupameyatvaṃ tadanugamo vācyābhiprāyeṇa yatpunarapūrvaṃ rūpamupamānatvaṃ tadanugamo vyaṅgyābhiprāyeṇeti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:830: nanvekatra viruddhadharmopanibandhalabhyaḥ kor'tha ityata āha-ekasya tu viruddhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:833: yata itthaṃ sadṛśāntarasyānanvayaḥ ataḥsaṃjñeyamanvarthetyāha-ata evānanvaya ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:853: itthaṃ ca satyupamānopameyabhāvavyatyayo vākyaikavākyatāmantareṇa na saṃbhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:877: iyaṃ yoddhukāmaṃ lavamālokya sakautukasya sūtasya candraketuṃ pratyuktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:881: atra hi pūrvānubhūtārthadarśanādeva smṛtiḥ na tu sadṛśānubhavāt /
GK16ruyalscu:886: kintu mṛgayānivṛttyādikaṃ smartavyasutpiviśeṣaṇamata iṣṭārtho 'pi na bhavatītyabhavanmatayogākhyo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:890: tato 'sya smaraṇālaṅkārasya kiṃ vaidharmyamityata āha-preyo 'saṅkārāsya tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:892: atrābhiniviṣṭasya nāyakasya priyānurāgasaṃskārāṇāṃ saskārāntarābhibhāva katayābhūyobhūyaḥsamuddhudhyamānānāṃ mahimnaiva smṛtiḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:903: iha tu karaṇaṃ nopalabhāmaha ityata āha-karaṇāsyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:904: kṛñbhvastyarthānāṃ sarvadhātvanuyāyitvāt kriyāyāḥsāmānyātmā karotyarthaḥ darśane 'pi saṃbhavata /
GK16ruyalscu:913: nanu smararipudarśanakautukāstamaye prakṛtanāyakadarśanaṃ heturiti kāvyaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-matāntara ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:916: smaraṇaṃ tu sarvatra na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:924: candratvādyāropasya yo viṣayo mukhādiḥ tasyānapahnavaśca rūpakālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:927: athāropa śabdārthaṃ vivṛṇvan vyudasanīyaviṣayavivecanapuraskāreṇa viṣayamasya vivecayati-āropo 'nyatrānyeti /
GK16ruyalscu:929: sa ca dviṣṭhatvāt viṣayiṇā viṣayeṇa cāvaṣṭabhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:931: yadā candra eva na mukhamiti viṣayasyāpahnavaḥ tadāpahnutyalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:934: viṣayī viṣayaṃ svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ karotīti rūpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:959: samastāni niravaśeṣāṇi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyātmakāni vastūni viṣayo yasya tat samastavastuviṣayam /
GK16ruyalscu:960: yatpunaḥ viśeṣaṇāṃśe kvacinna kriyate viśeṣaṇāṃśāntare viśeṣye ca kriyate tadekadeśa eva viśiṣya vartanādekadeśavivarti /
GK16ruyalscu:962: śliṣṭaśabdam aśliṣṭaśabdaṃ ceti dvairūpyamanuprapadya pratisvaṃ kevalaṃ mālārūpaṃ ceti pratama ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:972: yadā tu viśeṣaṇāṃśa rūpaṇabalādeva viśeṣye rūpakamarthādavagamyate,
GK16ruyalscu:975: evamādibhedāḥ sthūlatayā na pratanyanta iti āha-anyetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:989: atra grāmyajanoktau samastapadārthaviṣayatvāt samastavastuviṣayaṃ sāvayavaṃ rūpakam /
GK16ruyalscu:993: atra kīrtīnāṃ haṭhahṛtamahilātvamarthāt pratīyata iti ekadeśa vivarti sāvayavam /
GK16ruyalscu:994: kṣitibhṛta ityaṃśe tu saṃkaraḥ ityabhiprāyeṇāha-kṣitibhṛta ityatretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:996: atra na hanti kimityādau nāñā prathamato hananādināṣedhaḥ kimiti kākvā nirākriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:998: atra vaktrenduriti rūpaṇam yasyenduniṣṭhasya pīyūṣasya hetuḥ tadadharāmṛtena saha śliṣṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:1000: ata indurūpaṇadvārā bhātatvāt paraṃparitaṃ kevalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:1004: vairiṇāṃ kamalāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ saṅkoca eva kamalānāmasaṅkocaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1007: tadabhāva eva durgāyāḥ kātyāyinyā mārgaṇaṃ tatra nīlalohitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1008: samitaḥ saṃgrāmāḥ tā eva samidha edhāṃsi tatsvīkāre vaiśvānaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1012: dakṣaḥ dakṣaprajāpatiḥ vijaye prāgbhāvo 'gresaratā sa eva vijayādarjunātprāgbhāvaḥ purojanma tatra bhīma/
GK16ruyalscu:1015: atra viduṣāṃ mānasetvaṃ haṃsa iti pratītau kathamasya haṃsatvamiti vimarśo jāto,
GK16ruyalscu:1017: tathāvagamitena śleṣeṇa haṃsatvameva vyavatiṣṭhata iti śliṣṭaśabda paraṃparitamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:1022: dakṣabhīmapadayoḥ śleṣa eva pratītiviśrāntaḥ aṃśāntaramihodāharaṇamiti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:1034: nanukṣmāsauvidalla ityatra bhūmeḥ mahiṣyādirūpaṇamaśābdamityata āha-atra kṣmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1039: na kevalamidaṃ paraṃparitaṃ rūpakam anvayamukhenaiva yāvatā vyatirekamukhenāpi saṃbhavatītyāha-idaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1046: tatra kā gatirityata āha - atra cāropyamāṇasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1061: tairetaiḥ nimittairaṣṭabhiḥ viṣakāryaireva garalarūpor'thaṃ udbhāvyata iti neha viṣaśabdaśleṣo rūpakahetukaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1064: evaṃvidhe viṣaye śleṣa eva na tu rūpakamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1087: tasmādāropyamāṇaṃ candratvādimukhādau prakṛtārthe tādrūpyapratītyādhānarūpeṇa uparañjakatvenaiva rūpakālaṅkāre 'nvayaṃ bhajate /
GK16ruyalscu:1089: pariṇāmālaṅkāre punaḥ āropyamāṇaṃ na kevalaṃ prakṛtoparañjakaṃ yāvatā prakṛtarūpamapahnuvānaṃ sattadātmatvenopayujyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1099: itthaṃ ca sati viṣayitvāropaṇaṃ viṣaye tādrūpyapratītimātraṃ cedvivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1100: tadā tādrūpyapratīti janakatva mātramu parañjakatvam itye tāvataiva āropaṇasya caritārthatā /
GK16ruyalscu:1105: itarathā rūpakanyāyena prakṛtasya svarūpasthaganena prakṛtameva na pratīyeta /
GK16ruyalscu:1121: na khalvayaṃ kāvye lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ āgamarūpeṇa vā anumānarūpeṇa vā khyā (ta i)
GK16ruyalscu:1123: tatrāpi sāṅkhyayogādiśāstraviṣayeṇa pratijñātaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ śrīguruprasādasamanantaraṃ śaiśava eva yathā - “śaivaṃ viṣṇunibaddhamaupaniṣadaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ sapātañjalaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1125: bhūtānāṃ tu vinodanāya bharataṃ nīrti ca vātsyāyanaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1129: dustārkikajaradgavān pratyāpahālaparasya mamāyamanyaḥ ślokaḥ- sāṅkhyaṃ veśmani veśmani śrutiśiraḥ kakṣyāsu kakṣyāsu ca dvāri dvāri śivāgamāḥ pathi pathi prācāṃ kavīnāṃ giraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1132: mahārāja vīraballālāsthānajuṣāṃ viduṣāṃ prasādāśiṣo hi mayyetāḥ prathante /
GK16ruyalscu:1134: prākṛta pṛthvīśvaraḥ śaurasenī śiromaṇi magidhīmakaradhvajaḥ ṣaiśācīparameśvaro 'pabhraṃśarājahaṃso 'laṅkāracakravartī dhvaniprasthānaparamācāryaḥ sahajasarvajña(ḥ)
GK16ruyalscu:1140: veśaṣyābhujaṅga ityādyā mahārājahosalarāja kuladvāri praśasti śilāśāsanaprabhṛtibhiḥ vayamupaśāntarabhasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1144: sā cāyaṃ pariṇāmālaṅkāro dvirūpa iti vyutpādayati-tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1152: atrātarasyā prakṛtasyā na kevalaṃ maitrītādrūpyapratītimātraṃ vivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1154: ataḥ aprakṛtasya prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti prakṛtasya svarūpādapracyuteḥ pariṇāmatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1157: prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti pariṇāmabījabhūtaṃ upayogitvamuddhāṭayitumāha-bhrātasasya maitrītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1158: yata itthaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayoge pariṇāmālaṅkārasya viṣayavyavasthātasmāt samāsoktisādharmyamastīti vyutpipādayuṣurupakramate-tavatra yathetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1160: upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā nasāmukham /
GK16ruyalscu:1161: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16ruyalscu:1163: na lakṣita[mi]ti vākyānupreśāntaṃ vivakṣita iti prakṛtopayogī /
GK16ruyalscu:1167: na tu rūpakanyāyena rūpasamāropamātramityaṃśe pariṇāmasamāsoktyoḥ sādharmyamavagantavyamityata āha-evamihāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:1170: nanu yadi dvayoḥ prayogastarhi pariṇāmatvameva kathamityata āha-tādātmyāttviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1171: na khalu tādātmye sati “kṣīraṃ dadhīti” prayogamātrāt pariṇāmatvahāniḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1190: nirjñātameva ṇukhādilakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtamarthaṃ bhittī kṛtya candrādāvaprakṛter'thesandihyamāne sandehasya dviṣṭhatvāt prakṛtor'tho 'pi sandehaḍolāmadhirohati /
GK16ruyalscu:1191: itthaṃ prakṛtāprakṛtagatatvena ya utthāpyate pratibhayaiva sandehaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:1192: sa sandeho 'laṅkāraḥ na tu sthāṇupuruṣādāviva svarasavāhī /
GK16ruyalscu:1202: sarvā diśo na prasaratīti ūrdhva jvalanaikasvabhāva rūpatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1204: atrāsaṅkhya turagatvā dinā mārtaṇḍatvadisandehāpagama eva jāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1205: tena punarnāyakasya śṛṅgrāhikayā rūpanirjñānamiti niścayābhāsā ete /
GK16ruyalscu:1209: parato niścitamiti kathanāt dvitīyārdhānte itthaṃ sandihyetyadhyāhāryam /
GK16ruyalscu:1210: kvacitpunarviṣaye saṃśayitavye 'pira āropyamāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ viṣayāntaratvamapi bhavatīti āha-kvacidityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1215: nanvatra sambhāvanāpi pratīyata iti kathaṃ sandehālaṅkāra ityata āha-kecidadhyavasāyetyādi //
GK16ruyalscu:1233: niṣpatya ālīya sādṛśyāditi yaduktaṃ tatra pratyudājihīrṣurāha-gāḍhamarmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1240: alaukikatvanayo 'yaṃ sandehe 'pi samāna iti vyutpādayati-evaṃ sthāṇurityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1259: tāmanatikramya rucyādiṣu triṣu yathāyogamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayameva vā prayojakaṃ bhavatītiyāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1262: rurcyarthitvavyutpattyanusāreṇa ekasminnapyanusandhānena sādhite nirdhāriter'the ābhāsaḥ pratītirbhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1267: janapade hi tapovanatvādi dharmā nisargata eva santi /
GK16ruyalscu:1271: samastā vyastā iti munyādīnāṃ tapovanā ditvenollekhe tathāvidhā rucyādayo hi samastatayā vyastatayā vā saṃbhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:1275: yatra tvaṃśe rūpakaṃ tatra yadyullekhātmikā vicchittirna saṃbhavati tadā nāstyeva vivādaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1288: na hyanekadhāgrahaṇarūpaṃ vaicitryaṃ bhrāntimānapi svalakṣaṇopapanna ityata āha-saṅkarapravṛttistviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1290: vastuto hitapovanādyavayavāpekṣayā na jana padasyāvayavino bhedo 'sti /
GK16ruyalscu:1291: itthaṃ ca satyabhede bheda ityevaṃ rūpātiśayoktiratrāstu kiṃ manyakalpanenetyākṣepaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1300: nārāyaṇa iti pariṇatavayobhiḥ śrīvallabha iti taruṇībhaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1302: atra puraḥ praveśāvasare eka eva kṛṣṇo jaratībhiḥ sākṣānmokṣaprado nārāyaṇa itidṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1307: na cātra śaṅkanīyaṃ kautukeneti prayojakāntaropādānānneha rucyādayaḥ prayojakā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:1310: vacasi viṣayabhūte guruḥ prāmāṇikatvāt anullaṅghyo vācaspatiśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1313: ityādau hyeka eva upavarṇyo nāyako vacaḥ-pramukharviṣayabhedādgrahītṛbhedanairapekṣyeṇa rucyādivaśāt anekadhā gṛhyata ityullekhālaṅkāratvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1317: ato lakṣaṇopapannam alaṅkārāntaraṃ sati śleṣe na syāditi nātrollekho yukta ityākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1321: athāpi svarūpeṇa avidyamānasya bādhāsaṃbhavāt bādha evollekhasadbhāve liṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:1323: yata itthamato na tu sarvathā tadabhāva ityalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:1324: etadeva sādhayitum atraivodāharaṇe śleṣanairapekṣyaṃ darśayati-yadevaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1327: nirmalo yaśasi” iti śleṣābhāve 'pi na ullekhābhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1328: yasmāditthaṃ tasmādevamādau viṣaye ullekhālaṅkāra eva viśeṣavicchittika iti alaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā śreyān praśasyatara ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1342: yadyapi śleṣato bādho na tathāpyasya nihnavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1346: nanu mukhaṃ na bhavatīti viṣayāpahnavamātre satyapi nāpahnutirityato 'dhikāraṃ smārayati-vastvantarapratītirityeveti /
GK16ruyalscu:1348: tathāhi kāvyaprakāśakṛt- “prakṛtaṃ yanniṣidhyānyat sādhyate sā tvapahnutiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1349: ” nanu yadi sādṛśyādvastvantarapratītirihāpi ko viśeṣaḥ tarhyasya bhrāntimata ityata āha-prakāntānapahvavetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1353: ullekhe tu na prakṛtānapahnavamātraṃ viśeṣaḥ kintu anekadhāgrahaṇamapi jñeyam /
GK16ruyalscu:1364: tarhi tṛtīyabhede ko vicchrittiviśeṣaḥ ityata āha-pūrvaka ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1366: no māṃ prati tatheti prakṛtāpahnavaḥ uttarārdhe 'prakṛtasādhanamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1367: yadyapi apahnutireṣā tathāpi doṣānuviddhatvāt udāharaṇābhāsa ityata āha-atraindavasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1369: apahnotumiṣyasya śaśakasya yaḥ prativastubhūta ulkāpātakiṇaḥ tasyaivāropo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1371: itthaṃ lakṣaṇopapanno 'pi alaṅkāro doṣānuviddhaḥsan ābhāsī bhavatīti vyutpādya samyagudājihīrṣurāha-tattu yatheti //
GK16ruyalscu:1374: tenonnaddhaḥ utsikto janaḥ śṛṅgārī lokaḥ tasyābhimānaḥsāntvāsahiṣṇutā /
GK16ruyalscu:1376: atra na maṇḍalam api tu ātapatramevetyanvayo ghaṭate ayamapahnavapūrvaka āropaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:1386: api tu ambhaḥ kaṇā eveti pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1387: itthamevāpahnutim utprekṣāṅgatvena pratipipādayuṣurupakṣipati-atra śūnyaṃ ityasya ityādi //
GK16ruyalscu:1394: nanu cchralādiprayoge 'pyapahnavāropapaurvāparyaviparyayanibandhanaṃ vaicitryaṃ kiṃ nocyata ityata āha-etasminnapīti //
GK16ruyalscu:1400: ekavāsyatāyāṃ tu cchralādi śabdasya paurvāparyaviparyayaprasaṅge 'pi na pratītibhedaḥkaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:1401: kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena kriyāpekṣayā pratītau prāthamyaniyamāt atha śchrālādiprayoge dvidhā na gaṇitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1429: sa ca loke dvirūpaḥ samyagātmā mithyārūpaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1431: nahi śuktiriti samyagadhyavasāye rajatamiti mithyādhyavasāye vā vicchittiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:1432: ubhaya visakṣaṇāstu jānato 'pyetasmin tadeveti yo 'dhyāsarūpasya ihālaṅkāratvena parigṛṅyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1437: itthaṃ ca satyadhyavasāye viṣayabhūte yadā adhyavasānasya prādhānyaṃ tadotprekṣālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1441: viṣayaṃ nigīrṇavato viṣayiṇo viṣayitādātmyena pratītasya ihādhyavasāyo abhimata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1443: vyāpāraprādhānyagrahaṇasya vyāvartyamuddhāṭayitumāha- sa ca dvividha ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1446: uttaravākyagato 'pi yacchabdaḥ pūrvavākyācchabdopādānanirapekṣa eva tadarthena sambandhamīṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:1447: yatra viṣayiṇo 'satyatayā pratītiḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1449: mukhaṃ mukhatvena jānanneva yadā nūnaṃ candra iti saṃbhāvayati tadā viṣayī candro mukhatvenāsatyaḥ pratibhāti tadādhyavasāyaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1450: nanu sādhya evāstu adhyavasāyaḥ siddho vā,
GK16ruyalscu:1451: abhedapratītau kathamasatyatvaṃ ityata āha- asatyatvaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1454: nūnaṃ candra ityasyāṃ daśāyāṃ viṣayiṇyeva saṃbhavatyayaṃ viṣathayetu na saṃbhavatīti pratīyamānatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1459: tadāśrayasya satyatvāsatyatva pratītirityata āha-dharmo guṇakriyārūpaḥ ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1460: guṇakriyārūpa iti dharmasya sākalyakathanāt tadubhayamūlatayā utprekṣāsaṃbhavasmūcitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1461: asya hi dharmasya saṃbhavo 'saṃbhavaśca viṣayyāśrayatayā saṃbhavaḥ asaṃbhavastu viṣayāśrayatayā /
GK16ruyalscu:1463: kutaḥ? saṃbhavāśrayasya tatrāvasthāyāṃ paramārthabuddhyanudayāt asatyatvaṃ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1467: yata itthamadhyavasāyaḥ sādhyaḥ ataḥ utprekṣāyāmadhyavasāyavyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1470: sa iti dyotitaḥ ko 'sāvityata āha - yatra viṣayiṇo vastuta ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1471: yadā tu mukhamuddaśya candro 'pamiti prayogaḥ tadā vastuto 'satyo 'pi viṣayī satyatayā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1476: yadā sādhyatvapratītiḥ tadādhyavasāyasya paryāyān vyutpādayati - tatra sādhyatveti /

GK16ruyalscu:1489: atha saṃbhāvyasya hetvādi rūpatayā punastraividhyamāha-teṣu ca pratyekamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1495: lakṣaṇāparīkṣayostu kṛtayoḥ katicana hīyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1500: nimittānupādānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti yatpratijñātaṃ tatpramāṇo na draḍhayati-ivādyanupādāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1502: anupāttanimittakā hi yā vācyotprekṣā tasyām ivādyupādānabalādevotprekṣaṇapratītiḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:1519: tathā ca pratyekaṃ triskandhikā etā hetusvarūpaphalotprekṣaṇatayā skandhatrayamapi pratisvamaṣṭavidham /

GK16ruyalscu:1529: pratīyamānāyāṃ tu anupāttanimittāyā niravaśeṣaṃ pāte aṣṭacatvāriśaddhāniḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:1557: tatra yadyapi svarūpamutprekṣyate na tu hetuphale,
GK16ruyalscu:1564: na ca mantavyaṃ varṣaṇasya nabhaḥkartṛkatvāt na tamogatatvamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1565: nabhaso 'pi tamasādhiṣṭhintasyaiva varṣaṇakartṛkatvasaṃbhavādanena paraṃparāyātāyā api sambhāvanāyā utprekṣātvaṃ dyotitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1581: udāharaṇacatuṣke 'pi anugataṃ viśeṣam uddhāṭayati-etāni bhāvābhimāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1601: atha nimittopādānānupādānābhyāṃ ṣoḍaśakasya yaddvaividhyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tatra nimittopādānasya samanantarodāharaṇānyevodāharaṇatvena darśayati - ete nimittetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1603: atra lepanāditvena saṃbhāvane vyāpanādi nimittaṃ nopāttam /
GK16ruyalscu:1634: arthāśriyāpi dharmaviṣaye śliṣṭa śabdahetukā saṃbhavatīti yoddiṣṭā tāmudāharati-śliṣṭaśabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1639: mārgaṇaviṣayībhāvo dharmaḥ saṃbhāvanāśaṃ eva pratītiviśrānteḥ śleṣo notprekṣābādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1645: “sarvaprātipadikebhya upamānārthe kvip ityeke ācāryā” iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1647: kaṇṭhatviṣāṃ tilakādirūpatvaniyamāsiddheḥ tilakādirūpatāpi kadācitsyādupamānāṃśe saṃbhāvanāprāṇatvameva natu vāstavatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1650: upamānasya tilakādeḥ prakṛte kaṇṭhatviṅruḍpe saṃbhavaicityāt saṃbhāvanamātrasyocitatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1661: yattu vyaktivivekakṛdīddaśi viṣaye manyate-“ivādiśabdaireva prakṛtārthasyāsattvapratīteḥ chralādiśabdāḥ punaraktā” iti tat mandam /
GK16ruyalscu:1662: na khalvīddaśi viṣaye chalādiśabdāprayoge 'pi prakṛtārthasyāsatyāsatyatā gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1663: api tu utprekṣāṃ prati hetubhāva eva /
GK16ruyalscu:1667: athotprekṣāyā eva prapañcanārthaṃ tattadalaṅkārabījabhūta tattatpadāvāpoddhārābhyām alaṅkāravaicitryamāvirbhavatīti vyutpādayati-apara ivetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1673: kutracittu kāmacāraḥ iti vyutpipādayiṣurhetūtprekṣāṃ tāvat vyutpādayati-tadevaṃprakāretyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1676: sa dharmo 'dhyavasāyavaśāt abhedopacaraṇavaśāt abhinna utprekṣānimittamāśrīyate niyamena vācyo bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:1678: yadaivaṃ na syāt tadotprekṣamāṇo heturabhittikameva citraṃ syādityāha-anyathā kaṃ pratīti /

GK16ruyalscu:1682: api tu loke parasparamadraṣṭroryā kṣāmatā tadabhinnatvenā dhyavasitā saivaṃ cotprekṣitā darśanalakṣaṇasya hetoḥ phalam /
GK16ruyalscu:1685: adarśanaṃ pratya prakṛtaiva hi kṣāmatā phalaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1691: tadutprekṣaṇe ca laukikaduḥkhamaunatvābhedenādhyavasitaṃ nūpuramaunitvameva nimittaṃ duḥkotprekṣaṇaphalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:1701: atha dharmasya dharmigatatvenādhyavasāne nimittopādānānupādāne darśayati-yatra ca dharmaṃ evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1708: nanu dharme dharmotprekṣaṇavaicitryāya vyāpane lepanamutprekṣyatāmityata āha-vyāpānādau tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1712: ato 'navagatasya kalpanamavagatasya parityāga iti doṣadvayamāpatediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1714: yadi vyāpanameva utprekṣaṇaviṣayaḥ na hi tasyagamyamānatā yuktā /
GK16ruyalscu:1729: tadanupādāne parivartamānaṃ utprekṣyamāṇaṃ kasya phalaṃ syāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1731: anenāśīcilidhatvena dṛṣṭeṣu prabhedeṣu punaḥ keṣāñcit pātodarśitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1732: tathāhi-upāttanimittā ye ṣoḍaṣabhedāsteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ hetusvarūpa phalotprekṣaṇarūpatve aṣṭacatvāriṃśat /
GK16ruyalscu:1742: atha manyepramukhasya śabdasya saṃbhāvanādyotakatve 'pi tatprayogamātreṇotprekṣābhramo na kārya iti vyutpādayati-asyāścetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1753: hetau svarūpe cotprekṣye phale ṣaṇṇāvatiḥ punaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1780: atra mukhanayanagātralakṣaṇānviṣayān nigīrya kamalakuvalayakanakalatālakṣaṇā viṣayiṇaḥ tadabhedenādhyavasitāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1796: bālānāṃ tu yatkiñciditi nūtanaṃ vastu draṣṭavyamityeva,

GK16ruyalscu:1809: atra puṣpapravālādikayoḥ sākṣādasambandhe 'pi yadīti saṃbhāvanayā sambandhaḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:1827: atra tvāyāto mṛtā iti niṣṭhābhyāṃ tayoḥsamakālatā /

GK16ruyalscu:1842: phalaṃ tu tatrāpyabhedenaivādhyavasīyata ityata āha-aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ ityādāviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1843: aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaamityādau hi yat vastu tasmiddhaṃ laḍahatvaṃ yaccānyatvena kavisamarpitaṃ sātiśayaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1847: tatrāpi khalu “lāvaṇyadraviṇe“tyādau vedhaso lāvaṇyardraviṇasambandhe 'pyasaṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ na punastanvyā naisargikalāvaṇyakavisamarpitavedhaḥsambandhi lāvaṇyayorasaṃbandhaḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:1893: tvadaṅgamārdavaṃ paśyataḥ sarvasyaiva citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:1934: kṛpaṇānāṃ dhanaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇāmaṇiḥ kesarāṇi siṃhānām /

GK16ruyalscu:1983: atra bahūnāṃ vānarabhaṭaiḥ manthācalena sahadharmyapekṣo bimbapratibimbabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1984: divyavāgupāsanasya abdhilaṅghanena gurukliṣṭatvasyā pātālanimagratvena ca dharmāpekṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1985: nanu jānāti jānīta iti jñānasya pṛthaṅnirdeśāt kathamidaṃ dṛṣṭāntodāharaṇamityata āha-atra yadyapītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1989: yatra tu vivakṣā tatra na kiñcinnyūnamityata āha-yannibandhanaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1992: tvayā manasi garvābhimukhe kṛte tatkṣaṇameva dviṣo nihatā ityarthaḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:2008: yo girirāgataṃ abhyāgataṃ raviṃ satāṃ ātitheyī atithisatkṛtiḥ kāryeti bodhayan dhatte /
GK16ruyalscu:2010_0: bo dhanasamarthasya ācārogirau prayiktaḥ tasyācetantve 'pi kārīṣo 'griradhyāpayatītivat
GK16ruyalscu:2010_1: giriḥ gṛhamedhino bodhanakriyāsamarthān karotīti tatsāmarthyācaraṇo ṇicaḥ prayogāt
GK16ruyalscu:2015: nanu tarhi asaṅgatireva syādityata āha-laulāsadṛśīṃ līlāmityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2021: mārjanameva pāṇḍurīkaraṇaṃ na bhavati yataḥ atra yeṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntadhīḥ te mandā ityāha-kecidityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2023: sāpekṣatve tu nidarśanetyāha-yatra tu prakṛta ityādi /

GK16ruyalscu:2026: yatrāpyanatisphuṭaṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadhīrmābhūditi udāharaṇena darśayati-evaṃ caśuddhāntetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2027: āśramavāsino janasya śuddhāntadurlabhaṃ vapuryadīti yacchrabda uttaravākye tarhidūrīkṛtā iti tacchrabda mutthāpayati iti vākyārthayoḥ sāpekṣatvānnidarśanaiva iyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2034_0: viyogena nimittena pāṇḍarībhūtānāṃ nārīṇāṃ gaṇḍataleyaḥ pāṇḍimāsakharjurī mañjarīgarbhareṇuṣvalakṣyatetyatra
GK16ruyalscu:2034_1: upameyavṛttasya gaṇḍapāṇḍimro mañjarīgarbhareṇurūpa upamānavṛtterlakṣyatvāsaṃbhavāt upamā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2036: asyaiva ca prakārasya vaicitryāntarāyāha-eṣa prakāra upameyavṛttasya upamānavṛtte 'nvayāsaṃbhavalakṣaṇām /
GK16ruyalscu:2048: araṇyeti araṇyaruditaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛśoduḥkhātibhārasya duḥkhabhāgijanamantareṇa anubhūtatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2050: tathāvidhasya saṃskārasya tasya vā svasya vā anyeṣāṃ vā bhogāyogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2059: abudho janaḥ sevito yaditi vākyārthena viśeṣito yacchabdaḥ pradhāna vākyārthabhūtā(m)
GK16ruyalscu:2062: atha śābdopādānāṃ vināpi arthākṣepādeva nidarśanāvaicitryaṃ bhavatītyāha-kvacitpunarityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2077: bhedaprādhānye upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ // RuAss_28 //
GK16ruyalscu:2085: atra anivartino yauvanasya kṣayiṇo 'pi bhūyo 'bhivardhitaśaśivyapekṣayā nyūnaguṇatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:2092: nanu sahārtha tayā tulyakakṣyayoḥ kathaṃ bhedapradhānatetyata āha-guṇapradhānabhāvetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2095: bhedaprādhānyaṃ tu vyatirekanayena sādhārmyabhitti kamiha na bhavati api tu guṇā pradhānabhāvabhittikamiti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2097: sahārtho hi tṛtīyāṃ taṃ guṇatvena prayojayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2098: nanu sahārthatve ka upamānopameyabhāva ityata āha-upamānopameyatvaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2101: ato vaivakṣikameva na tu vāstavamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2103: nanu dvayoḥ prākaraṇikatvamevāprākaraṇikatvameva vetikiṃ niyāmakamityata āha-sahārthasāmarthyāditi /
GK16ruyalscu:2104: nanu tarhi vaivakṣikatve katarat kena rūpeṇa vivakṣyatāmityata āha-tṛtīyāntasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2106: sahaśabdo hi niyamena tṛtīyāntasya śābdaguṇatvaṃ kalpayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2112: evaṃ nyāyakrame sthite 'pi viśeṣo 'nyo 'syāḥ prayojaka ityāha-tatrāpītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2113: atiśayoktirapi na sākalyena asyā mūlamityata āha-sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2114: kāryakāraṇapratiniyamaviparyayo 'tra tulyakālatā na tu kāryasya pūrvakālatā sahārthatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2118: kartṛkarmādi sāhityanibandhanenāpi prābhedena prathata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2126: aparādhānāṃ ca tṛtīyāntatvāt viśeṣaṇānāmupamānatvaṃ niyatamaparādhā yathā vardhanta iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2127: santāpasya tu pradhānatvādupameyatvaṃ santāpastathā vardhata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2133: astaṃ bhāsvāniti-saṃhriyantāṃ viprakīrṇāni ekīkriyantāmityarthaḥ atra śleṣābhittikābhedādhyavasāyarūpā mūlamiti darśayati-atrāstaṅgamanamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2136: evamatiśayoktimūlatvādilakṣaṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadabhāve sahoktimātraṃ nālaṅkāra iti vyutpādayati-etadviśeṣeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2143: dyujanamṛtyoḥ ātpikriyāpekṣayā kartṛtve 'pi tasyopasarjanatvāt neha kartṛsāhityam /
GK16ruyalscu:2161: bhārgavāhaṅkṛtikandalasya tu dhanurbhaṅgāntamabhagrasya bhaṅgasamasamayaṃ bhaṅgaḥśrīmatā rāmacandreṇākārīti samanvayāt karmasāhityamiha mālātvenāvatiṣṭhate /
GK16ruyalscu:2172: kañcidarthaṃ vinā yatra śobhanatvaṃ nāsti saikā vinoktaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2179: na hyasmin sati tattvamasattvaṃvetyuktau vicchittiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:2182: sattvalaṅkāraphalatvena prātpe prakāśyata ityāha-evaṃ cānyanivṛttāvapi ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2186: vinayādiṣu ca satsu śrīprabhṛtisadbhāvaḥ phalatvena prakāśyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2188: vinādi śabdābhāve tadarthaṃ sadbhāve vinoktireveti vyutpādayitumāha-atra vinā śabda ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2192: atra tuhināśudarśanaṃ vinā nalinījanma na śobhanamiti pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2196: atra ca hetuhetumadbhāvavyaktayo vinoktereva vicchittiviśeṣādhāyakaḥ na punaralaṅkārāntaramityāha-iyaṃ ca parasparetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2200: loke hi mṛgalocanāṃ vinā vicitravyavahārapratibhāprāgalbhyaṃ nāsti suhṛdā vinā ca sundarāśayatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:2207: atha viśeṣaṇavicchittimūlau samāsoktiparikarau prastauti - adhunā viśeṣaṇeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2208: viśeṣaṇa vicchittiśca dvirūpā sābhyaṃ sābhiprāyatā ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2212: yatra viśeṣyāṃśe prakṛtamātraparatā viśeṣaṇasāmyāt punaraprakṛto 'vagamyate sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇā abhidhānāt samāsoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2223: yadā purgamyatvaṃ prastutaviṣayaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyāt tadānīma prastutapraśaṃsā,
GK16ruyalscu:2225: aprastutasya gamyatve yadi viśeṣyasyāpi sāmyaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-viśeṣyasyāpi sāmye śleṣaprāpteriti /
GK16ruyalscu:2227: nanu śleṣālaṅkāraḥ śabdaśaktimūladhvaniśceti triṣu viṣayeṣvapyasti śliṣṭapadāpanibandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2228: tatra yadā śleṣaḥ tadārthadvayasya niyamena vācyatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2229: vācyatvaṃ caivaṃ saṃbhavati-yadārthau dvāvapi prākaraṇikau staḥ aprākaraṇikau vā tadā viṣeṣaṇaviṣyāṃśayordvayorapi śliṣṭapadopanibandhāt śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2231: atha yadaikasya prākaraṇikatvamitarasya aprākaraṇikatvaṃ tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthak śabdopādānabalādeva śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2232: yadi viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭapadopanibandhaḥ tadā prakaraṇaniyantritāyā abhidhāyāḥ prākaraṇikārthaḥ evopakṣayāda prākaraṇikarthāvagatirvyañjanasyaiva viṣayaḥsyāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2236: yadā punaḥ prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭatā tadā tāvanna samāsoktiḥ viśeṣaṇamātrasāmyalakṣaṇā yataḥ śleṣālaṅkāratvaprātpirapi /
GK16ruyalscu:2238_0: na hyatra dvayorvācyatopapattiḥ prakaraṇapakṣapātinyā abhidhāyā aprākaraṇiker'the
GK16ruyalscu:2243_0: ato viśeṣyāṃśe saṃsparśābhāvādviśeṣyaṃ prakṛtārthaṃ na svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ kartumīṣṭe
GK16ruyalscu:2243_1: kindu viśeṣaṇāṃśapratītaṃ svavyavahāraṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśapratīte prakṛtārthavyavahāre 'vacchredakatvena samāropayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2248: nanu yadā rūpasamāropaḥ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-rūpasamāropetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2272: upoḍharāgatvādiśliṣṭa viśeṣaṇamahinmā khalvatra niśāśaśinau nāyakavyavahāra viśiṣṭau pratīyete /
GK16ruyalscu:2273: nanu katham atra nirjñāyate vyavahārasamāropo na rūpasamāropa ityata āha-aparityaktetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2274: yadi rūpasamāropastadā prakṛtau rūpakanyāyena svaṃ svaṃ rūpamavacchrāditatvena parityajya yadavacchrādakamupamānarūpaṃ tādrūpyamupagṛhṇāti /
GK16ruyalscu:2275: iha punarviśeṣyāṃśe niṣpratiyogikatayā jñātayorata evāparityakta sva rūpayoḥ niśāśaśinorviśeṣaṇasāmyāvagamitena nāyakatvadharmeṇa viśiṣṭatayā pratīteḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2280: iha tanutvādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmubhayatraikārthatāsāmyaṃ na tu śliṣṭatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2282: nanu tanutvādidharmasāmyāt kathaṃ latāvyavahārapratītirityata āha-tatra ca lataiketyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2283: vikāso hi latāyā eva tatsamāropo lolākṣyā latāvyavahārapratīteḥ kāraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2285: yathaivaṃ viśeṣaṇasādhāraṇyaṃ dharmasamāropaśca vyavahārasamāropasya kāraṇaṃ tathā kāryasamāropo 'pīti vyutpādayutumāha-evaṃ ca kāryetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2286: kāryasamāropanibandhano hi bheda iha dharmasamāropanītyā sujñānaḥ upari ca śuddhatvena pṛthagrāśīkariṣyati /
GK16ruyalscu:2295: atrānapekṣitākhyāne vākye śravaṇa samanantarameva dantaprabhāpuṣpacitatvādinā hetunā hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ suveṣatā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2297: atha dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairiti madhyamapadalopi samāsāntarapratyāyitaiḥ puṣpapallavādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇāsāmyadaśāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2301: rūpasamārope tu rūpakamiti pratipāditam yataḥ ataḥ pratīto 'pi rūpakasamāsa iha nyāyato na prāpnoti /
GK16ruyalscu:2302: nanvevamādau prāgupamāsamāsāsasamāśrayaṇanimittaṃ yadi suveṣatvādinā nopāttaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-atraiva parītetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2305: uta dantaprabhā eva puṣpāṇītyādiko rūpakasamāsa iti sandehaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:2308: na ca mantavyaṃ samāsaḥ sandeho papanna iti,
GK16ruyalscu:2311: atha sandehopaśamakāle dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairityādi pūrvavadeva madhyamapadalopasamāsaḥ latāvyavahārapratītau samāsoktāveva viśrantiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2312: itthaṃ ca sati upamā samāsagarbhatayā saṅkarasamāsagarbhatayā ca samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ dvidhā darśito mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2313: nanu kevalarūpakasamāsāśrayeṇāpi samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-rūpakagarbhatvena tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2314: prāk rūpakasamāse atha tadgarbhatayopamāsamāsāśraye yadyapi viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ bhavatyeva,
GK16ruyalscu:2317: nanu upamāsamāse saṅkarasamāse ca samāsoktivaiparthyaṃ kiṃ na syādityāha-na ca prāṅnidarśitetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2323: ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye rūpakaprātpau samāsokte prātpiriti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayitumāha-taccaikadeśavivartītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2325: payodo vidyunnayanairniśāyāmabhisārikāyāḥ mukhaṃ nirīkṣya dhārānipātaiḥ saha candro mayā vānta iti dhiyevārtataraṃ rarāsetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2326: atrāśliṣṭam ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ samāsokternāvakāśaṃ dadātīti darśayati-atra nirīkṣaṇetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2328: ataḥ puruṣānusāreṇa yojane vidyuta eva nayanānīti rūpakameva na punarupamā saṅkaro vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2330: taccedamārtataraṃ rarāseti pratīyamānotprekṣāyā eva nimittaṃ samāsokte raprātpireveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2334: eṣu rūpaṇasāmarthyānmadano mahārājatayā madhuśca śrīkaraṇāgraṇītvena rūpitaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2336: nanu patrāṇīvetyādirupamā kiṃ na syādityata āha-dvirephamaṣītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2337: maṣīyogo hi madhāvasaṃbhavannupamā samāsaṃbādhitvā gaṇakavṛtteḥ saṃbhavastadanusāreṇa rūpakasamāsaṃ sādhayatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2338: nanu samāsoktiprastāve kiṃ sodāharaṇaṃ rūpakabhedapradarśanenetyata āha-asya ca pracura ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2351: itthaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyātpañcaprakāratvasiddhā vavāntaraṃ viśeṣasahitāmimāṃ punastrirāśikatayā saṃcaṣṭe-itthaṃ śuddhakāryetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2352: kāryasya śuddhatvaṃ nāma nirūpita viśeṣaṇasāmyā saṃkīrṇatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2357: yadā punaridamanupacaritaṃ tadā pañcadhodāhṛtam prāk sa dvitīyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2359: anupacaritaviśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanasya nyāyanirbharatvena prāk pradarśanaṃ pañcavidhatvena kṛtamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2362: anyadātvanupacaritaṃ anugatamekarūpaṃ tu prayojanaṃ nānupaśyāma ityata āha-sarvatra cātretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2364: tasya cāturvidhyaṃ darśayati-sa ca laukika ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2366: anena ca vyavahārasamāropacāturvidhyena rāśitrayamapi pratyekaṃ caturdhā prathate /
GK16ruyalscu:2374: atropacaritatvādaprastutāvagatau viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ nātibaddhabharam api tu śuddhakāryasamāropa eva ityāha-atra patrāvalītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2385: eṣitriṣu rāśiṣu vyavahārasamāropa vaicitryanibandhanāt bhedānupadarśayitukāma āha-vyavahārasamāropetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2409: parameśvarasya hi sarvavṛttiṣvakatvaṃ rūpamavyayatvaṃ asaṃkhyatā na kutaścidapideśakālāderbheda iti idameva lakṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2411: atha sarvāsu kārikādivṛttiṣvekatvādisaṃkhyārahitamavyaye hi syāditi pratiyogyekatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tvabhedaikatvamevar /
GK16ruyalscu:2412: idṛśamavyayaṃ paśyadbhiḥ paratvajuṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paratvalakṣaṇāyāḥ vibhakteḥ prathamāderlopaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2420: arthādanāpātādarthāpatterna ca na yaditi pramāṇānuktāvapi vastutar idṛśi lāvaṇye mīmāṃsādisiddhādṛṣṭādivastusamāropaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2431: yadvā candramasa iti viśeṣyādhyāhārādoṣadhipaterityetat viśeṣaṇātayā vivakṣiṇīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2434: jñeyaścāsau pārimityaṃ jahāti na vaktuṃ śakyaḥ na ca lakṣayituṃ kintu guruvaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2436: atra guṇagaṇe śṛṅgārādirasavyavahāraḥ samāropita ityāha-atra bharatetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2441: tātparyaṃ hi nāma abhihitānvayamate samanvayaśaktiḥ abhidhottīrṇā samanvayamātra viśrāntayānayā samanvayasamanantara pratītiko raso na jñāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2444_0: mukhyārthabādhādyabhāvannāpi lakṣyaḥ api tu vedyāntaravigalanādaparimitaḥsan abhidhālakṣaṇātātparyottīrṇena
GK16ruyalscu:2444_1: vyañjanākhyena kāvyaikagāminā śāstrāntarāpūrveṇa vyāpāreṇa viṣayīkriyamāṇo laukikatvāt
GK16ruyalscu:2444_2: anukāryamabhinayaprayāsanighnatvāt anukartāraṃ ca parihṛtya sahṛdayaikagata iti budhairavasīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2448: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya kṛta iti tata evāvadhārya ityalam /
GK16ruyalscu:2451: atraidupahvaram-vāgdevatā hi parā paśyantī madhyamāvaikharī ceti catuṣpadaparimitā /
GK16ruyalscu:2452: tatra nāmarūpātmakaṃ prapañcaṃ svātmanyupasaṃhṛtya svarūpajyotīrūpiṇī jāgaritādidhāmatrayollaṅghinī parā /
GK16ruyalscu:2454: pārāyāḥ sakāśāduditā maṇipūrakāt anāhatāvadhi prāṇaparispandotkṣubhitabuddhivṛttyabhimāninī varṇapadādiparigrahāntaḥsaṃjalapātmikā paśyantīprabhāvā svapnavṛttirmadhyamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2457: atha saṃhārāvasare jāgaritalayapuraskāreṇa vaikharī madhyamāyāṃ līyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2462: itthaṃ ca sati śaktimānātmā parāyāṃ turīyāṃ ,
GK16ruyalscu:2468_0: tava parayā devyā saha krīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane aprayāsena tādṛśī samādhisāmarasye pravṛtte
GK16ruyalscu:2468_1: bāhyā vāk kathaṃ cāṭūccāraṇācāpalaṃ sphuṭatālvoṣṭhapuṭavyāpāramakhatatāṃ kathaṃ nāma
GK16ruyalscu:2469: kuto nāstītyata āha-ābhyantarī paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati,
GK16ruyalscu:2474: tatra vaikharī kathaṃ nāma pravartatām iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2476: yathā parayodevyā paṭṭamahiṣyā saha tava kriḍādṛḍhāliṅgane pravartamāne anyā kācidābhyantarī ābhyantaratvādeva yuvayorāliṅganaṃ paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati gopayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2478: madhyamāvṛttirmadhuradhvaniḥ yathā bhavati tathā ujjihāsārasāt truṭyatiṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:2480: tatra bāhyā parigrahaveśyā cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ kathaṃ vitanutāmiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2485: śuddhakāryasamārope hi vilikhati kucāvityādau yat kucavilekhanādi ha(ṭha)
GK16ruyalscu:2487: kakāryaṃ tasya yadyapi na mukhyatayā yat khadirādiviśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2491: atha yatra samāsokterasāmañjasyaṃ tatra nyāyasañcāreṇa samañcāreṇa samañjasīkartumāha-iha tvityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2493: ārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī śaradravestāpabhabhyadhikaṃ cakāra /
GK16ruyalscu:2506: aindraṃ dhanuḥ śarada evaviśeṣaṇaṃ na nāyikāyāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2507: nanvārdranakhakṣatābhamiti viśeṣaṇaupamyādekadeśavivartinyupamā śaradi tatsāmarthyādinduravyoḥ nāyakatvapratītirastvityata āha-na caikadeśeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2515: nanu yadyekadeśavivartinyupamāyā iha saṃbhavaḥ tadaryupamālaṅkārasyaiva prātpirma samāsokterityata āha-athātretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2528: anyaniṣṭhasya dharmasyānyatra saṃcāraṇaṃ kutra dṛṣṭamityata āha-yathā dadhnetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2529: dadhnā juhotītyatra hi havanagatatvena vidhiḥ pratītaḥ sa tvagnihotraṃ juhotītya(ta)
GK16ruyalscu:2534: atha yatra nyāyataḥ samāsoktimapohya ekadeśavivartinyupamaiva prathate taṃ viṣayaṃ darśayitumāha-iha punariti /
GK16ruyalscu:2536: atra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītau nimittaṃ vivacayati-saraḥ śriyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2540: na tu vyavahārasasāropeṇa saraḥśrīdharmatayā ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinī upamaivopāsyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2545: samprati sādhiteti vyāghāta ityata āha-yatra tu keśapāśetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2546: dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīvetyādi samāsenoktāyāmupamāyāṃ satyāmapi dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairivetyādi samāsāntaramahimnā viśeṣaṇasāmyamupapadyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2548: samprati tu netrairivetyatra gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinyupamaiva vyavasthāpiteti vyaghātābhāvāt sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:2549: athārthāntaranyāsa prabhāvitāyāmasyāṃ vaicitryāntaraṃ astītyāha - sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2558: upagūḍhatvaṃ śāntataṭitkaṭākṣatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ tadutthāpitayā samāsoktyā nāyakavyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2559: tathā sati samāsoktyāliṅgito yo 'yaṃ viśeṣātmā sa sāmānyātmanā arthāntaranyāsena samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2561: paribhraṣṭapayodharāṇāmiti śleṣavaśādupagūḍha iti viśeṣaṇaṃ sādhāraṇatayā sphuṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:2589: prasannagaṃbhīratvaṃ nāma padānāṃ vyāṅgyārthagarbhīkāra eva na tu vyaṅgyasya vācyātiśāyitā /
GK16ruyalscu:2598: kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca na niḥsahāyasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2602: jīvatā eva na tu mūrcchitasya mṛtasya vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2612: arthadvayasya yadā prākaraṇikatvamaprākaraṇikatvameva vā tadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ śabdasāmye śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2613: yadā tūbhayamayatvaṃ arthadvayasya tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthagupādāne śleṣa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2619: viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śabdasāmyaṃ tadā arthaprakaraṇādinā abhidhāniyāsyāt na tu śleṣasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2620: anekārtho hi śabdaḥ prakaraṇādinā prākaraṇika evārthe niyamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2621: ādye tu prakāradvaye niyamahetvabhāvāt dvāvapi vācyau /
GK16ruyalscu:2622: itthaṃ sati vikalpo vyavatiṣṭhata ityāha-ata eveti /
GK16ruyalscu:2627: abhavena asaṃsāreṇa balidaityajitkāyaḥ purāmṛtasaṃvibhāgakāle strīkṛtaḥ strībhāvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2630: agaṃ govardhanaṃ gāṃ mahīṃ ca yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ varāhāvatāre adhārayat /
GK16ruyalscu:2631: yasya ca stutyaṃ nāma amaraḥ śaśimacchirohara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2635: atha yena dhvastamanobhavena nāśitamanmathena balijitkāyaḥ viṣṇorvapuḥ purāṇāṃ saṃharaṇe astrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2636: yaścedvṛndrakalāvat stutyaṃ ca nāma hara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2640: lubdhairmadhulaṃpaṭaiḥ vyādhaiśca bhūriti kriyāviśeṣaṇam ekadā śilīmukhairbhramaraiḥ anyadā bhūribāṇaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2667: puṣpeṣu kusumānatareṣu ruciṃ śobhāṃ puṣpabāṇapriyatāṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2671: alaṅkārāntareṣvaprāpteṣu anārabhyamāṇo 'yaṃ niravakāśatvāt balīyāniti bādhitvā tatpratibhāmātra mutpādayatīti kecit /
GK16ruyalscu:2673: anye punaḥ “yena dhvastamanobhavene“ti alaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣayaḥ iti sāvakāśatvānnānyabādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2674: ato 'nyasampāte saṅkaraḥ nyāyato vā daurbalye bādhyatvamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2680: yatrobhayarūpānekārthagocaratvaṃ tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ tatra tu dīpakaṃ prabhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:2684: yata itthaṃ nāsya viviktaviṣayatā ato 'laṅkārāntarāṇi śleṣabādhitāni pratibhāmātrāvaśeṣāṇi bhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2685: itthaṃ sati vivakto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena dhvastetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2686: itthaṃ vivikto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena dhvastetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2688: alaṅkāryalaṅkaraṇabhāvo hi āśrayāśrayibhāvenopapanno loke karṇāśritaḥ karṇālaṅkāra iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2691: nanu arthabhede śabdabhedo 'pi bhinna eveti raktacchradamityādāvapi na śabdaikyamityada āha-yadyapītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2695: ataḥ sāhityasaraṇeḥ pratītyaikasāratvāt śabdaikyapratipādakadarśanāvaṣṭāmbhācca nāsti śabdabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2709: itthaṃ niravakāśatvobhayālaṅkāratvasiddhau sakalakalamityādau śleṣa eva nopamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2714: tarhi rūpakasamāsoktyoḥ kuto ca bādha ityata āha-śleṣagarbhetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2715: rūpakaṃ hi siddhaśleṣamutthāpya svasvarūpa eva viśrāmyatīti śleṣabādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2716: tatrāpi yadi śleṣaḥ pūrvasiddho rūpakamutthāpya yadi svarūpe viśrāmyati,
GK16ruyalscu:2724: samāsoktau tu śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇanibandhanāyāṃ viśeṣyāṃśasya gamyatvāt samāsoktireva bādhikā /
GK16ruyalscu:2728: jagatsu trayīmayatvena prathito 'pi vivasvān vāruṇīṃ prati yadagamat /
GK16ruyalscu:2731: pātityaṃ adhaḥ pradeśasaṃyogaḥ upahatiśca patitatvādeva śuddhyaibaḍavāgnimadhyaṃ viveśetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2733: loketrayīmayasya sato vāruṇī sparśato yau pati tatvāgrapraveśau,
GK16ruyalscu:2737: yadyapyekaiva kriyā kartṛbhedabhinnā satyabhedenādhyavasitā sa tu tatkriyā(ekakriyā)
GK16ruyalscu:2740: ata eveti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭo yo virodhālaṅkāraḥ viruddhacaraṇābhāsarūpaḥ tenālaṅkṛtor'thaḥ pātityarūpa hetutvenotprekṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2745: tā, uttarakālaṃ tu virodhopaśama iti pratītikramaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2746: itthañca sati śleṣaḥ sarvabādhakaḥsan virodhālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā pratibhāmātreṇāvasthāpayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2749: yatra tu nāṭakādau bhāvyarthopakṣepātmakaṃ bījanyāsalakṣaṇaṃ sūcakatvaṃ tatra mīmāṃsārthamāha-yatra tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2764: śleṣastu dvayorvācyatvābhāvāt sarvathā na pravartata iti dhvaneḥ eva viṣayo 'yam /
GK16ruyalscu:2766: śabdaśaktimūle hi dhvanau vācyapratīyamānayoḥ sambandhābhāvāt sambandhāyaupamyaklṝtpiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2767: sa(ca)sambandhaḥ aupamyānapekṣayā prakārāntareṇa yadi sūpapādaḥ tarhi upamādhvanau ko 'bhiniveśaḥ?
GK16ruyalscu:2770: ata eva dhvanikṛtā śabdaśaktimūlo dhvaniḥ alaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti dvidhā nyāyata uktaḥ- alaṅkāro 'tha vastveva śabdādyatrāvabhāsate /
GK16ruyalscu:2773: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛte 'pi sūcakatvasambandhāt śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniravaseyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2776: kauśaikadik ulūkadiśā harṣātmikā te hi prabhāte harṣeṇa kūjanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2780: ākāśaṃ rāṣṭrasamaṃ icchyā tyaktvā valkalasadṛśadhūsarakāntidharaścandraḥ astaśailaṃ yau /
GK16ruyalscu:2781: atha tatkāntāpi niśā samullāsibhiralikulaiḥ krandhantaṃ sutamiva kumudākaraṃ sāntvayantī tena saha kṣipraṃ pratasthe /
GK16ruyalscu:2782: sūcanīye tvarthe viśvāmitrakrodhavaśāt icchyā rāṣṭraṃ tyaktvā vārāṇasīṃ prasthitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2783: tatkāntāpyauśīnarī krandantaṃ rohitāśvaṃ sutaṃ santvayantī tenaiva saha prasthiteti /
GK16ruyalscu:2785: nanu dhūsarakāntivalakaleti sutamiveti ca aupamyasambandhasadbhāvāt kathamayaṃ vastudhvanirityata āha-valkalasūtābhyāṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2788: ataḥ prakṛtena saha sūcanīyasya sūcanasambandhācca śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvanireva /
GK16ruyalscu:2790: atha yatra na tulyayogitā nāpi dīpakaṃ tatrāpi nāstyalaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣaya iti darśayituṃ āha-iheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2791: atra viśeṣaṇānāṃ alakākarṣavaktrāsañjanādīnāṃ vallabhaparatayā prathamaṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2792: atha itthaṃ vadantyāste lajjā pralīneti sakhīvyavahāke nahi nahīti vallabhasya nihnāvapuraḥsaraṃ kūrpāsakavalyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2793: atra hi na tulyayogitā dīpakaṃ vā ato vivikto 'yaṃ śleṣaviṣaya iti na śaṅkanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2796: apahnavo hi vastutaḥsādṛśyārthaṃ pravarttate iha tu sādṛśyaṃ apahnavāya pravṛttimiti nāyamapahnava iti codyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2810: itthaṃ nyāyanirbhagharatayā anena prapañcito 'pi kāvyaprakāśakṛtā pratipadaṃ khaṇḍito 'yaṃ śleṣo 'laṃṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2812: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya darśitā iti tat evāvadhāryāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2815: aprastutāt sā mānyaviśeṣabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve sārūpye ca prastutapratītā vaprastutapraśaṃsā // RuAss_34 //
GK16ruyalscu:2822: tatra sāmānyādviśeṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sārūpyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2823: tatra sāmānyadviśesaṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyasya pratītiriti dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2828: athasarvaiveyaṃ vācyasya saṃbhavena ubhayarūpatayā ceti tridhā /
GK16ruyalscu:2829: śliṣṭaśabdaprayoge tu śleṣeṇa na bādhyate prastutasyāvācyatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2840: kiṃ tat? kamalinīpatre pāthasaḥ kaṇaṃ muktāmaṇirityāmaṃsteti yat /
GK16ruyalscu:2842: sa evātijaḍaḥ yastu muktāmaṇidhiyā'dīyamāne tatra pāthaḥkaṇe aṅgulyagrakriyāpravilayini satimama maṇiruḍaḍīya gata iti antaḥśucā na nidrāti /
GK16ruyalscu:2845: kimiyaṃ prapadyata iti paśyāma iti dhiyā saṃlāpaparihārādirūpaṃ sthairyaṃ mayālambitam /
GK16ruyalscu:2846: tayā tu “ayaṃ khalu śaṭhaḥ māṃ na kimapyālapatīti“kopa āśritaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2847: ityanyonyavailakṣaṇyena darśanacature tasminnavasthāntare mayā vyājena hasitaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2860: yena lambālaka iti-atra lambālakatvādinā kāryeṇa gajāsuravadharūpakāraṇapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2864: dvayorapi prastutatve kāraṇāpekṣayā kāryopavarṇanasya sacamatkāratve taddvārā kāraṇapratyāyanaṃ paryāyoktaviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2870: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛtasyaca sataur'thasya svopaskārāya prakṛtānatarāgūraṇe paryāyoktameveci prathanāya punarāha-tataśca anayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2876: atra rājaśukavṛttasyāpi nāyakapratāpāṅgatayā prakṛtatvāt paryāyoktameva boddhavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2879: idṛśi viṣaye anyeṣāmaprastutapraśaṃsāsātve buddhāvapi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:2881: kāryasyāprastutatve tu aprastutapraśaṃseti vibhāgasyānā kūlatvāt ityabhiprāyeṇāha-sarvatheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2882: atha etāni sādharmyodāharaṇatvena vijñeyānītyāha-etāni sādharmya iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2884: sārūpyahetukaṃ tu bhedam anayā nītyā sādharmyeṇa sujñānatvātāṃ vaidharmyaṇodāharati-dhanyā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2894: pramukha eva śākoṭakavṛttasya āropitatva pratīteryujyata evāsambhavaḥ vācyasya jahatsvārthalakṣaṇāmūlatvena atyantatiraskārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2900: śleṣagarbhatve caitadeva draṣṭavyam chridrakaṇṭakaguṇānāṃ śliṣṭatvādityāha-etadeva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2902: arthāntaranyāse hi sāmānyaviśeṣyayoḥ kāryakāraṇayośca vācyatvaṃ(dṛṣṭānte tu)
GK16ruyalscu:2915: ābhyāṃ sambandhābhyāṃ samarthyatvena nirdiṣṭasya prakṛtasya samarthanamarthāntaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2927: atra guṇasannipāte doṣanimajjanalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ sādharmyeṇa viśeṣasamarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2929: puṃsāṃ lokottaraṃ caritameva pratiṣṭhām arpayati audāryaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2935: sahaseti-kriyā dhyavasāyaḥ sahasāvidhānarūpo hyāvivekaḥ āpadāṃ padam anenāpatpadatvarūpaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvarūpasya kāraṇasya vaidharmyeṇa samarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2937: sahasāvidhānābhāvātmano vimṛśyakāritvasya kāraṇasya sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sādharmyeṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:2938: atra sādharmyasya prāthamikatvāt uttarārdhārthapuraskāreṇa yojayati-atra sahasāvidhānetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2941: pṛthvīti-dvitayaṃ pṛthvī bhujaṅgarūpaṃ tat tritaye kūrmarāja yuktadvitayātmani /
GK16ruyalscu:2945: aho hīti-āyuṣā bahvaparāddhaṃ hi suhyadaḥ parābhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ridṛśamapriyaṃ vaktavyatvenāpatitaṃ yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2954: samarthyatve na nirdiṣṭaḥ prakṛto yaḥ samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2976: stutyā nindāyā gamyatve ekā nindayā stutestvanyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2977: ato vyājarūpāstutiḥ vyājena stutiriti ca vigrahaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2980: anugamena arthānvayena dvitīyā tu nindāvyājena stutiriti āha-yatrāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:2982: nanu stutinindayorgamyāṃśasya prastutatvāda prastutapraśaṃsātaḥ ko bheda ityata āha-stutinindeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2985: sa hi kadācideva parasya hitamādhāt tvaṃ tu ye yāvantastṛṣyanti,
GK16ruyalscu:2986: tebhyaḥsarvebhya eva vaimukhyalabdhānāmayaśobhārāṇaṃ prodvahane maroḥsāhāyarkaṃ karoṣi /
GK16ruyalscu:2991: urvīvalayatilaka indulakṣmādiṣu śyāmaleṣu satsu tvadyaśobhirnakiñciddhavalitaṃ iti stutirgamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2994: yatra tu gamyāṃśasya nyagbhāvastatra nāsyāḥsāmañjasyamiti darśayitumāha-kiṃ vṛttāntairiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2995: atra vallabhā bhramati hantetyuktyā nindāyāḥsutiparyavasāyitvaṃ na sphuṭībhāvati,
GK16ruyalscu:3004: uktavakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepaḥ // RuAss_38 //
GK16ruyalscu:3005: uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā prākaraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ ābhāsato niṣedhanam ākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3009: ata eva vidheyasya sa kṛtaḥ aviṣaye pravartita ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3014: gajo hi snāta eva san sadyo dhūlidhūsaro bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:3017: tatra kasya kaḥ prakāra ityata āha-uktaviṣayatvenetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3033: bālaka/ nāhaṃ dūti tasyāḥ priyo 'sīti nāsmākaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3036: yati prasīdeti brūyāmasati kopa idaṃ vaco na ghaṭate /
GK16ruyalscu:3037: evaṃ na punaḥ kariṣyāmīti cedbrūyāṃ tathā vidyamānasyābhyupagamaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:3038: na me doṣo 'stīti cedbrūyāṃ tvaṃ punaridaṃ doṣābhāvavaco mṛṣetijñāsyāsi /
GK16ruyalscu:3039: ataḥ kiṃ vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi /
GK16ruyalscu:3045: athavā vyatikrāma kiṃ bhaṇama iti tu tasyaiva pratyāsannataratvādbhaṇatyanarhatā /
GK16ruyalscu:3047: atra virahavedanāvaśāt jyotsnāpikavacaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ tamaḥkrakacādirūpāpattyā yato durantatā /
GK16ruyalscu:3058: udīryamāṇasya idaṃ na ghaṭata iti niṣedhamukhenaiva /
GK16ruyalscu:3060: kiṃ bhaṇāma iti sāmānyadvāreṇa vaktumiṣṭasya jīvitasaṃśayādeḥ svarūpata eva bhaṇitiniṣedha ityarthavaśādāgūraṇam ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3061: sā nūnamityaṃ śoktau jīvituṃ na śaknomītyaṃśāntarasya svarūpato bhaṇitiniṣedhādāgūraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3066: nanu niṣedhākṣepaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vidhinā tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:3069: yata itthaṃ niṣedhena vidherākṣepaḥ atar idṛśi viṣaye nālaṅkāntaramityata āha-tataśceti /
GK16ruyalscu:3074: atra hyaparityājyatādi bālyāderna niṣedhakamapi tu tasya sādhakameveti nākṣepabuddhiḥ kāryā /
GK16ruyalscu:3077: tasmāt kāraṇāt saukaryeṇa viśeṣasiddhyarthaṃ tasya niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepokteḥ nimittaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:3079: ato yatra niṣedho vāstavo na tatrākṣepa iti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayati-iha tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3080: atra pūrva śloke daityā iva kāvyārthacorā luṇṭanāya yatpraguṇībhavanti,
GK16ruyalscu:3082: uttaraśloke tu sarve yathecchaṃ gṛhṇantu loke 'pi na kṣatiriti,
GK16ruyalscu:3084: tathā vāyoḥ kārāgṛhakḷptyai kandarāsu śilākavāṭadānaṃ vihitaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:3085: uttaraśloke evaṃ cintārūpaṃ dainyaṃ mṛṣā kirātā marutāsaha nirodhanavairaṃ necchrandīti kavāṭadānaṃ sākṣānniṣedhyata iti naitadyugalakayugamākṣepodāharaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3089: gaṇikā dhanaparāyaṇāḥ satyaḥ sarvam asāmpratamācaranti yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3090: atastvayā viśvāso na kārya iti gaṇikāyā evoktau viśvāsaniṣedha ābhāsāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3103: anvayavyatikekāvasthāyino vastuno nyāyyo 'pi anvayavyatirekāvasthāyitayā samāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3116: yato vidhirayaṃ ābhāsamāno niṣedhe vyajyamāna upakaraṇam ato vidhyābhāsena vyañjakenāyaṃ nirūpyamāṇo niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3117: sa cāniṣṭaviśeṣe paryavasyan ākṣepālaṅkāra iti yojanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3126: jigamiṣāsti cet nāhaṃ nirākaromi iti gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3127: gacchretyatra tu tena puraskṛto vidhirmamāpi tatraiva gatirbhūyāditi tu prāṇanairāśyāviṣkārān niṣedhapratyāyanam /
GK16ruyalscu:3137: gacchasicedityukto hi kiṃ tatra gamanena mama saṃvijñānetyādi pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3144: haṃso hi śithilāṃsaḥsan saviśeṣaṃ ramyo bhavati,
GK16ruyalscu:3148: anabhipretasyaiva sato gamanasya no kiñciktathanīyamastīti pramukha evābhyupagamaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3149: itthaṃ ca sati vidhirayaṃ aniṣṭatvenābhāsamāno niṣedhāgūraṇātmana ākṣepasyāṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:3150: smartavyā ityanena bhūyastarānniṣedha evopodvilitaḥ tathāvidha vīcismṛtau gamanavārtāyā apyayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:3170: atra janmani punaritthām anubhūtamanastvamiha na prākkoṭyapekṣaṃ pūrvamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3171: vivekasya viśeṣato dhvaṃsādupacitena mohāndhakāreṇa duruttaraḥ ko 'pi virahavikāro antarjaḍayati tāpayati ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3182: ataḥ śleṣagarbhatve śleṣo bādhakaḥ udbhaṭamatāvalambinām anyeṣāṃ tu saṅkaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3200: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇamantareṇa na saṃbhavatīti tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt tadabhāve 'pi yadi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:3202: yadi kenaciduktivaicitryeṇa kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryasaṃbhava upanibaddhaḥ tadā vaiśiṣṭyena kāryabhāvanā dvibhāvanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3210: etadvavyatirekarūpayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇasya viśeṣoktyalaṅkārasyāpi virodhato bheda ityāha-evaṃ viśeṣoktavityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3219: ataḥ kriyā vyatirekiṇo 'pi kāraṇāsya saṃbhavāt sāmānyataḥ kāraṇagrahaṇameva kṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:3222: sā cātiśayoktirvibhāvanāṃ na vyabhicaratīti na bādhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3238: anye tu saṃbharaṇāpuṣpayormaṇḍanāstre pratyāsavamadanyāyena sākṣādakarāṇatvādvāṅmātraṃ vibhāvanātvavacanam /
GK16ruyalscu:3241: apare tu vayasi maṇḍanatvādyāropāt rūpakameva yattva saṃbharaṇādi vaiśiṣṭyaṃ tadatraiva adhiropitamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3245: rūpakatve hi vayaso maṇḍanaṃ rūpopagrāhitāyā maṇḍanamevedamityādi prasajet /
GK16ruyalscu:3259: ataḥ kāraṇāni cet samagrāṇi tadā niyamena kāryotpattiriti sthitam /
GK16ruyalscu:3264: itthaṃ ca sati viśeṣamabhivyaṅgaktum uktiriti viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3279: tatra hetuḥ anuktaścintitumaśakyaḥ triṣvapi yojayati-atra satyapi dāheti /
GK16ruyalscu:3280: svarūpeṇa śaktimāniti svaśabdena viruddhena dharmeṇa kvacidiyaṃ vibhāvanayā saṅkīryata iti darśayitumāha-kāryānupattirityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3284: yo me prathamaparibhogena kaumāraṃ hṛtavān adyāpi sa eva varaḥ vasantakṣapāḥ api tā eva /
GK16ruyalscu:3289: athāpi revānadīkūle tatra vetasītarutale suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau cetaḥsamuktaṇṭhate /
GK16ruyalscu:3300: atra ślokaḥ- kāryāṃśasya yadā bhāvābhāvau vaktumapekṣitau /

GK16ruyalscu:4310: kaveḥ kakavinibandhasya vā vaktuḥ nibandhavaśādastyeva sakalavyavahartṛgocarībhātatā durapahnavāvicchittiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4311: tatra kuto na bhāvikamityata āha-yadi tu vāstavamapītyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:4312_0: yadi vastusanniveśyapi saundaryanibandhavaśāt savicchittikaṃ prāñca ācāryāḥ svabhāvoktivadalaṅkāratayā
GK16ruyalscu:4312_1: varṇayeyuḥ tadā ayamapi vāstavasaundaryaviṣayatayā samāśaṅkito bhāvikaprakāro nātīva
GK16ruyalscu:4313_1: sādhāraṇyena sacotanasaṃvādācca vicchittimatī varṇitā tathaiva vāstavasaundaryāvalambitayā
GK16ruyalscu:4314: tathā ca satibhūtabhāvitvādi sāmagrīsadbhāve 'nyakalpanāgauravādayamapi bhāvikaprakāra iti unmīlanaṃ yogyatayā suśakameva /
GK16ruyalscu:4315: unmīlitā ścollekhabhāvodayasandhiśabalatādaya atiprathana svātantrye 'pi cirantanasamayavyatikramaḥ syāditi /
GK16ruyalscu:4317: bhūtabhāvinaḥ pratyakṣā iva yatra kriyante ityetāvadeva bhāvikalakṣaṇamakāri yaiḥ khalu tairaśabdānākulatvādiva lakṣaṇatvenoktam /
GK16ruyalscu:4320: ato bhūtabhāvipratyakṣavadbhāvikalakṣaṇasya bhāvikasya śabdānākulatvavāstava saundaryāvalambenāpi bhāvikaprabhedo 'bhyanujñāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4325: satyapi sādṛśyaṃ kiñcinmātraṃ athāpi nyāyasañcārāyehāsmābhiḥ lakṣaṇamasya kṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:4373: tathā vibhāvānubhāvaiḥ sūcitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ devatāviṣayā ratiśca bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4376: eṣāṃ caturṇāmupanibandhe paripāṭyā rasavān preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitamiti alaṅkārā iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4382_0: ratihāsaśokādīnāṃ vāsanātmanāṃ sthāyibhāvānāṃ yāni loke kāryakāraṇasahakārīṇi tāni
GK16ruyalscu:4382_1: kāvye sandṛbdhāni nāṭye cābhinītāni guṇālaṅkāramahimnā caturvidhābhinayamahimnā ca
GK16ruyalscu:4383: taiḥ prakāśito vyañcito ratyādiḥ sāmājikacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śṛṅgārādiko rasa iti dik /
GK16ruyalscu:4389: vibhāvānubhāvābhyāṃ vyañjito vyabhicāri vākyārthībhāvadaśāyāṃ bhāva ucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4392: tathā kāntāvyatirikte devatādiviṣaye vyañjito ratyādirapi bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4401: nanu rase 'pi praśamaḥ kiṃ nocyate ityata āha-tatrāpītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4402: rasasya hi akhaṇḍanirantarāyapratīti carvaṇīyasya paramaviśrāntirūpatvāt madhye prayāsya davasthā durlakṣyeti rasavyatiriktapariśiṣṭabhedaviṣayo 'yaṃ praśamo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4405: yatra hi vyañjanopaskṛte 'rbhidhādivyāpārātmani nibandhe raso 'sti tadrasavat /
GK16ruyalscu:4408: nanu nibandhane balaṃ nāma kimityata āha-anaucityeti /
GK16ruyalscu:4412: kasya? prakṛtatvāduktasya bhāvabhedasya yasya praśama ityapi paryāyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4413: nanu rasavadādinā dvitāyodāttasya ca kā kakṣyetyata āha-tatra yasminnityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4414: yatra hi bhāmahādidarśane vākyārthībhāvāt pradhānabhūtā eva rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ tatra aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya upapadyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4416_0: yasmiṃmastu rasavadādiralaṅkāro aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya eva aṅginastu rasāderalaṅkāryabhāvāpannasya
GK16ruyalscu:4420: bhūtāḥ tatra rasavadādayo 'laṅkārā ityalaṅkāramātrarasikānāṃ bhāmahādīnāṃ darśane /
GK16ruyalscu:4423: dhvanidarśane tu kāvyātmano rasādeḥ prādhānyadaśāyāṃ alaṅkāryatvādalaṅkārabhāvānupapattau aṅgabhūtā rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4424: tathā ca sati rasabhāvādināyakamahāpuruṣacaritāvirbhāvo 'pi rasabhāvādyaṅgabhāvānatirekī vyaṅgyavyañjakamanbandhāt /
GK16ruyalscu:4429: kiṃ hāsyeneti-svapnadṛṣṭa nāyakaṃ svarūpasandarśananihnavaparihāsapravṛttaṃ manyamānasya ripustrījanasyoktivarṇanam /
GK16ruyalscu:4430: kiṃ hāsyena cirātprātpraḥsan punarme darśanaṃ na prayāsyasi?
GK16ruyalscu:4431: niṣkaruṇatā taveyaṃ prātpisamakālameva pravāsarucitā ityudīrayannevatamadṛṣṭvā “kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ“iti vadan vyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā riktabāhulayacastāraṃ roditīti /
GK16ruyalscu:4442: evaṃvidhe hi viṣaye vākyārthībhāvāt aṅginaṃ rasaṃ rasavantamanye pratipedire /
GK16ruyalscu:4444: dhvanidarśanavidastu aṅgino alaṅkāryatāṃ aṅgibhūtasya rasavadādirūpatāṃ dvitīyodāttāsaṃbhavaṃ ca siddhāntitavantaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4445: iyaṃ ca prakriyā rasāntareṣvapi jñeyetyāha-evaṃ rasāntareṣviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4450: preyo 'laṅkārādau tu viśeṣāṃśastu jñāta iti sādhāraṇyenodāhīrṣurāha-preyo 'laṅkārādāviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4454: harṣākhyo vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4455: vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4459: alaṅkārāntarabhramau mā bhūdeti paryāyamasyāha-eṣa eva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:4470: ato rasaṃ guṇīkṛtya nibandhanameva balāditi ūrjasvī /
GK16ruyalscu:4500: atrautsukyaṃ bhāvasyodayaḥ tasya ca guṇabhāva iha vivakṣaṇīyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4502: vāmena kareṇa priyatamāyā nayanāśrudhārāṃ dakṣiṇīna kṛpāṇādhārāṃ pramārjayan kartavyamūḍho 'bhūdityatthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4508: atra kkākāryaṃ kva ca śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kulamiti vitarkaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4529_0: ya ete anuprāsādayo bhāvaśabalatāntāḥ pṛthaguktāḥ teṣāṃ saṃbhavānusāreṇa yadi kutracit
GK16ruyalscu:4529_1: viṣaye sahabhāvaḥ tadaite kiṃ pṛthakpṛthagevālaṅkārāḥ utta sahabhāvavaicitryamalaṅkārāntarameveti
GK16ruyalscu:4530: sauvarṇa maṇimayānāṃ pṛthak cārutvahetutve 'pi saṃśleṣato yathā cārutvāntaraṃ tathānuprāsādīnāṃ apyalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:4533: yatobheda utkaṭo 'nutkaṭaśca ato dṛṣṭāntau samañjasāvityāha-ata evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4536: saṅkaraḥ saprabhedaṃ jijñāsito 'pi saṃsṛṣṭyanantaraṃ vakṣyata ityāha-saṅkarastviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4539: atra pūrvārdhe bhakārāpekṣayā uttarārdhe ca lakārāpekṣayā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4541: tathā lakalolakalo iti kalolakalola iti ca sajātīyayamakayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4553: pāda evāmbujamiti rūpakapakṣesa pratikūlaḥ ambakūlaḥ ambuje tadayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:4570: evaṃ ca sati aṅgulībhiriveti yā vākyenoktā yā ca sarojalocanam iti samāsena tābhyāmupamābhyāṃ śleṣeṇa cānugṛhītā mukham iti atiśayo(ktiḥ)
GK16ruyalscu:4572: teṣāṃ balena samutthānādutthitā cotthāpakānāṃ camatkānāṃ camatkārakatvahetuḥ ityaṅgāṅgitā /
GK16ruyalscu:4577: atra vāruṇīti śleṣaḥ trayīmayo 'pyagamaditi virodhapratibhotthāpakaḥ tadvādhakaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:4583: tatra virodhaśleṣā vanupraviṣṭau yacca kāraṇotprekṣānimittaṃ pātādikāryaṃ tatra vāstavau pātāgripraveśāvupahatihetukapātāgripraveśābhyāmabhedena adhyavasitau /
GK16ruyalscu:4585: nanu virodhaśleṣayoratiśayoktyutprekṣayośca kuto nāṅgāṅgibhāva ittyāha-na ca virodhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4586: yadyapi śleṣo viridhapratibhotpattihetuḥ yadyapi cātiśayoktiḥ utprekṣānimittaṃ tathāpi nānayoḥ śleṣābhyāṃ sahāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4592: śleṣasya tu viviktau'styevetyata āha-na ca mantavyamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4594: ataḥ śleṣeṇa anyabādha iti tamnadhyānupraviṣṭo virodho 'pi bādhya eva /
GK16ruyalscu:4613: yathā hi śabdayormitho nopakāraḥ tathā śabdālaṅkārayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4614: kastarhir idṛśi viṣaye prakāra ityata āha-śabdālaṅkāreti /
GK16ruyalscu:4618: ataḥ śabdālaṅkāraparihāreṇa aṅgāṅgibhāva iti nirṇāyati-evameṣa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4634: mukhameva candra iti rūpakasamāsaśca sādhakabādhaka pramāṇavirahādanayoḥsandehaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4638: binduḥ śuddhādhvopādānamahāmāyā nādo 'nāhataḥ tau prasaratoyasmāt sisṛkṣostasmai /
GK16ruyalscu:4647: iha śaṅkara eva kṣīrasindhuriti rūpake sādhakam /
GK16ruyalscu:4649: amṛtaśabdo hi sudhāyāṃ pracuraprasiddhikaḥ kṣīrasindhāvanukūlatarara iti rūpakasamāsa evāyam /
GK16ruyalscu:4657: avantīścararūpāt pārijātāt jātāni yaśorūpāṇi prasūnāni digrūpāṇāṃ vadhūnāmavataṃsayāmi, paśyata /
GK16ruyalscu:4665: nanu śaradīveti samabhivyāhṛteyam upamā kathaṃ nopamāsādhiketyata āha- natu śaradīveti /
GK16ruyalscu:4666: nyāyato vākyārthībhūtaṃ rūpakamābhāsata ekadeśavirtinyupamā na hi bādhiturm iṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:4674: prakāntenaikenaiva nirvahaṇīyamiti naiṣā rājājñā yena dṛṣṭabādha āśaṅkyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4675: yallaṅghanenadṛṣṭabādṛṣṭayordvayorapi bādhaḥsyāt yato nyāyo 'yamityatata āha-nāpyeṣa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4678: iha tu uttarottaraṃ prakarṣavivakṣeti upamāpekṣayā rūpake sāmyaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4683: hāraḥ kuṭhārāyata iti tūpamayā prakarṣa nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4685: sāmānyaprayoge upamābādhaka iti nyāyopanno rūpakaprakrama eva nirvahīṇīya iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:4689: itthamaṅgāṅgibhāvasandeha rūpaṃ prakāradvayaṃ vivicya tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ vivecayati-tṛtīyastviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4697: ekatraiva narakaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau śliṣṭaśabdenobhayopakārāt śabdaśleṣeṇāpyupamā saṅkarārthamāha-atra ca yathetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4705: ataḥ sāmagrīyogāt sampannā dyotitaraṅgaśobhinītyekasminneva śabde sabhaṅgapadatvāt śabdaśleṣeṇa saṃkīrṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:4712: udbhāṭaprakāśitastu prakārāntaragocaraśabdārthālaṅkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭau antarbhāvita iti tasya saṃkaratvamaṅgāṅgibhāva evoktamityāha-śabdārthālaṅkāretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4733: stutyā nindāyāḥ nindāyā vā stutergamyatve vyājastutiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4760: nanu śabdādyalaṅkāratve ko doṣa ityata āha-tadalaṅkāratvaprayojakatva iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4766: itthaṃ bhūmrā rucakavacasāṃ vistaraḥ karkaśo 'yaṃ ṭīkāsmābhiḥ samuparacitānena sañjīvanīyam //
